variable.name: HYBRID_SELECTION_DESIGN
variable.description: Design number of the hybrid selection reagents
variable.value: Design with baits to mtDNA and 1560 nuclear gene loci (coding and 5' UTR exons)
Design with baits to mtDNA and 1605 nuclear gene loci (coding exons only)

variable.name: BERNIER_CRITERIA
variable.description: Status of OXPHOS disease diagnosis based on Bernier diagnostic criteria

variable.name: MORAVA_CRITERIA
variable.description: Score of OXPHOS disease diagnosis based on Morava diagnostic criteria
